content: for the lobster top star both the front and the back panel are worked flat and bottom-up the plain back panel is knitted first followed by the front panel that features the stranded colorwork lobster design the contrasting-color i-cord edges are integrated throughout both panels are attached at the shoulder seams the top is closed on the sides with i-cord ties **materials ** mc 150 200 200 250 300 g cc 100 100 100 150 150 g of sandes garn line 50 g = 110 *120 yds* or drops belle 50 g = 120 m *131 yds* **sizes ** xs s m l xl **bust circumference ** 90 100 110 120 130 cm / *35 ½ 39 ½ 43 ¼ 47 ¼ 51 ¼ inches* **length ** 52 55 58 61 64 cm / *20 ½ 21 ½ 22 ¾ 24 25 ¼ inches* measured from the top of the shoulder to the hem **sizing guide **the top is designed to have about 0 cm of positive ease at the bust the sizes xs s m l xl are designed to fit a bust circumference of 85-94 95-104 105-114 115-124 125-135 cm / *33½-37 37½-41 41¼-44¾ 45¼-48¾ 49¼-53¼ inches* the front panel of the top is 45 50 55 60 65 cm / *17¾ 19¾ 21¾ 23½ 25½ inches* wide so make sure everything you want covered in the front is covered if need be you can make slight adjustments to the circumference with the i-cord strings **watch my design process** https //youtu be/0lhvzd4nu6g **follow me** www youtube com/@stella r studio www instagram com/stella r studio/ © 2025 stellarstudio
